Credit: Dir: Sofia Coppola With: Katie Chang, Israel Broussard, Emma Watson
Outline: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

Name: The Pink Panther
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Martin, Kevin Kline, Jean Reno
Outline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

Name: Snakes on a Plane
Credit: Dir: David R. Ellis With: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips
Outline: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Name: The Skulls
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Joshua Jackson, Paul Walker, Hill Harper
Outline: Luke McNamara, a college senior from a working class background joins a secret elitist college fraternity organization called "The Skulls"...

Name: The Black Dahlia
Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Josh Hartnett, Aaron Eckhart, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

Name: Money Train
Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Jennifer Lopez
Outline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Name: National Security
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Martin Lawrence, Steve Zahn, Colm Feore
Outline: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

Name: Johnny Mnemonic
Credit: Dir: Robert Longo With: Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren, Dina Meyer
Outline: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

Name: The Pink Panther 2
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Steve Martin, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer
Outline: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Name: Exit Wounds
Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Steven Seagal, DMX, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Name: Stolen
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, Malin Akerman, Josh Lucas
Outline: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

Name: Charlie's Angels
Credit: Dir: McG With: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu
Outline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

Name: Showtime
Credit: Dir: Tom Dey With: Robert De Niro, Eddie Murphy, Rene Russo
Outline: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based T.V. cop show.

Name: Whiteout
Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Tom Skerritt
Outline: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

Name: Beverly Hills Cop III
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Eddie Murphy, Jon Tenney, Joey Travolta
Outline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Name: Dhoom:3
Credit: Dir: Vijay Krishna Acharya With: Aamir Khan, Katrina Kaif, Abhishek Bachchan
Outline: To avenge his father's death, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics turns thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago. Two cops from Mumbai are assigned to the case.

Name: The Whole Ten Yards
Credit: Dir: Howard Deutch With: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Natasha Henstridge
Outline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

Name: Double Impact
Credit: Dir: Sheldon Lettich With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Geoffrey Lewis, Alonna Shaw
Outline: Jean Claude Van Damme plays a dual role as Alex and Chad, twins separated at the death of their parents...

Name: Judge Dredd
Credit: Dir: Danny Cannon With: Sylvester Stallone, Armand Assante, Rob Schneider
Outline: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

Name: The Specialist
Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods
Outline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Name: White Chicks
Credit: Dir: Keenen Ivory Wayans With: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Busy Philipps
Outline: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

Name: Bangkok Dangerous
Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Nicolas Cage, Charlie Yeung, Shahkrit Yamnarm
Outline: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

Name: Blackhat
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis, Wei Tang
Outline: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

Name: Max Payne
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Beau Bridges
Outline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Name: The Counselor
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Fassbender, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Name: Hollywood Homicide
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Harrison Ford, Josh Hartnett, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Name: Daredevil
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell
Outline: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Name: A Good Day to Die Hard
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch
Outline: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

Name: Trespass
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Nicolas Cage, Nicole Kidman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

Name: One for the Money
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Katherine Heigl, Jason O'Mara, Daniel Sunjata
Outline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Name: Spring Breakers
Credit: Dir: Harmony Korine With: Vanessa Hudgens, Selena Gomez, Ashley Benson
Outline: Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying/drinking/taking drugs they are arrested only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

Name: Balls of Fury
Credit: Dir: Robert Ben Garant With: Dan Fogler, Christopher Walken, George Lopez
Outline: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

Name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Kevin James, Keir O'Donnell, Jayma Mays
Outline: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

Name: Alex Cross
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Tyler Perry, Matthew Fox, Rachel Nichols
Outline: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Name: Get Carter
Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Sylvester Stallone, Rachael Leigh Cook, Miranda Richardson
Outline: Years ago, Jack Carter left his Seattle home to become a Las Vegas mob casino financial enforcer. He...

Name: Hot Pursuit
Credit: Dir: Anne Fletcher With: Reese Witherspoon, SofÃ­a Vergara, Matthew Del Negro
Outline: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the outgoing widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

Name: Big Momma's House
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Martin Lawrence, Nia Long, Paul Giamatti
Outline: To protect a beautiful woman (Nia Long) and her son (Jascha Washington) from a robber (Terrence Howard), a male FBI agent (Martin Lawrence) disguises as a large grandmother.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: 50 Cent, Joy Bryant, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
Outline: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

Name: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
Credit: Dir: John Pasquin With: Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner
Outline: After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.

Name: Knock Knock
Credit: Dir: Eli Roth With: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas
Outline: When a devoted husband and father is left home alone for the weekend, two stranded young women unexpectedly knock on his door for help. What starts out as a kind gesture results in a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

Name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
Credit: Dir: McG With: Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Cameron Diaz
Outline: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

Name: The Spirit
Credit: Dir: Frank Miller With: Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Name: Elektra
Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
Outline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

Name: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
Credit: Dir: Jim Drake With: Steve Guttenberg, Bubba Smith, Michael Winslow
Outline: The misfit Police Academy graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

Name: Big Momma's House 2
Credit: Dir: John Whitesell With: Martin Lawrence, Emily Procter, Nia Long
Outline: An FBI agent reprises his disguise as a corpulent old lady and takes a job as a nanny in a crime suspect's house.

Name: Taxi
Credit: Dir: Tim Story With: Queen Latifah, Jimmy Fallon, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen
Outline: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

Name: xXx: State of the Union
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Ice Cube, Samuel L. Jackson, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

Name: Striptease
Credit: Dir: Andrew Bergman With: Demi Moore, Burt Reynolds, Armand Assante
Outline: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

Name: Home Alone 3
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Alex D. Linz, Olek Krupa, Rya Kihlstedt
Outline: Alex Pruitt, a young boy of nine living in Chicago, fend off thieves who seek a top-secret chip in his toy car to support a North Korean terrorist organization's next deed.

Name: Littleman
Credit: Dir: Keenen Ivory Wayans With: Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans, Kerry Washington
Outline: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

Name: Basic Instinct 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, David Thewlis
Outline: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

Name: RoboCop 3
Credit: Dir: Fred Dekker With: Nancy Allen, Robert John Burke, Mario Machado
Outline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

Name: Gunday
